set number.description: Show absolute line numbers on the left.

set relativenumber.description: Show relative line numbers on the left. These change based upon where your cursor is.

set expandtab.description: One tab should be comprised of spaces(" ") instead of one tab ("\t")

set incsearch.description: Display search results as you type (instead of only upon ENTER)

set smartcase.description: Be smart about case when searching

set cmdheight=2.description: Set height of the command bar to 2

set ttyfast.description: Boost speed by altering character redraw rates to your terminal

set showmatch.description: Show matching brackets when text indicator is over them

set foldcolumn=1.description: Place a width 1 margin on the left

set encoding=utf8.description: Set utf8 as encoding & en_US as language

set numberwidth=3.description: Sets width of the 'gutter' column used for numbering to 3 (default 4)

set clipboard=unnamed.description: Use the OS clipboard by default

set shiftround.description: Shift to the next round tab stop. Aka When at 3 spaces, hit >> to go to 4, not 5 if your shiftwidth is set to 2.
